import React from "react"; import { Button, Container, Table, Image } from "react-bootstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { useCart } from "../contexts/CartContext"; export default function Cart() { const { cartItems, addToCart, removeFromCart } = useCart(); return (

Shopping Cart

{cartItems.length > 0 ? ( <> {cartItems.map((item, idx) => { return ( ); })}
# Product Image Product Name Quantity Unit Price Product Sub-Total
{idx + 1} {item.productName} {item.qty} ${item.price} ${(item.price * item.qty).toFixed(2)}

Sub-Total Cost: ${subTotal.toFixed(2)}

Shipping Cost: ${shippingCost.toFixed(2)}

Tax (HST 13%): ${taxCost.toFixed(2)}

Total Cost: ${totalCost.toFixed(2)}
) : (

Your cart is empty.

)} ); }
